text: Yemwe abemeye! Mujye muhagarara mwemye (mwuzuza inshingano zanyu) kubera Allah, kandi mujye muba abahamya batabogama, ndetse urwango mufitiye abantu ntiruzatume mutabagirira ubutabera. Mujye murangwa n’ubutabera kuko ari byo byegereye gutinya Allah, kandi mutinye Allah. Mu by’ukuri, Allah azi neza ibyo mukora
